ジョブ


mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl apply -f job.yaml 
job.batch/pi created

mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl get po
NAME       READY   STATUS              RESTARTS   AGE
pi-xx6z2   0/1     ContainerCreating   0          3s

mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl get po
NAME       READY   STATUS              RESTARTS   AGE
pi-xx6z2   0/1     ContainerCreating   0          6s

mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl get po
NAME       READY   STATUS      RESTARTS   AGE
pi-xx6z2   0/1     Completed   0          18s


mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl get job
NAME   COMPLETIONS   DURATION   AGE
pi     0/1           15s        15s


mini:ex-1_job takara$ kubectl logs pi-xx6z2
3.


https://dev.classmethod.jp/articles/s3-compatible-storage-minio/

export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AalekpnhnGnm3rxpvRf1
export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=LOx7yRAYKHQ8Lnd30NUzWzfqY99kHuOJPfnRJCYv

$ aws --endpoint-url http://127.0.0.1:9000 s3 ls
2018-08-30 17:59:45 minio-bucket

$ aws --endpoint-url http://127.0.0.1:9000 s3 ls s3://minio-bucket/
2018-08-30 17:59:45 14 hello-minio.txt

$ aws --endpoint-url http://127.0.0.1:9000 s3 cp s3://minio-bucket/hello-minio.txt .
download: s3://minio-bucket/hello-minio.txt to ./hello-minio-dl.txt

$ cat hello-minio-dl.txt
Hello, minio!



aws --endpoint-url minio-0.minio.default.svc.cluster.local s3 ls

nobody@mypod2:/$ aws --endpoint-url http://minio-0.minio.default.svc:9000/ s3 ls
2024-05-05 23:08:49 test

aws --endpoint-url http://minio-0.minio.default.svc:9000/ s3 cp /backup/dump.sql s3://test/
